successes.title: GameStick: The Most Portable TV Games Console Ever Created
successes.description: Putting Big Screen Gaming In Your Pocket.

Pledges.description: NAME CHECK: Help accelerate an industry by getting this great product off the ground. Get your name listed within the GameStick User Interface as a founding contributor.
FOUNDER TAG: Name Check + Reserve your username before launch + Get a founder tag next to that username.
EARLYBIRD: Get GameStick, (console + controller), bundle for the super low price of just $69 + all the above!
GAMESTICK BUNDLE: Missed the Earlybird? Fear not, here is another chance for you to get your hands on a shiny new GameStick, (console + Controller) + Name Check + Founders Tag!
GAMESTICK BUNDLE WITH CASE: GameStick, (console + Controller) + Name Check + Founders Tag + a Handy Carry Case!
GAMESTICK BUNDLE WITH CASE & DOCK GameStick (console + controller) + Name Check + Founders Tag + Carry Case + GameStick Dock!
GAMESTICK BUNDLE +: Get Gamestick, (console + Controller), + Additional controller + Name Check + Founders Tag!
GAMESTICK BUNDLE + WITH CARRY CASES: Get Gamestick, (console + Controller), + Additional Controller + Name Check + Founders Tag + 2 Handy Carry Cases!
GAMESTICK BUNDLE + WITH CASES & DOCK (Console + controller + Additional Controller + Name Check + Founders Tag) + 2 Carry Cases + GameStick Dock.
GAMESTICK BUDDIES - 2 X GameStick Bundle (2 consoles + 2 controllers + 2 Name Checks + 2 Founders Tags) + 2 Carry Cases - Saves $20!

DESIGNED BY ME! : Help us to perfect the GameStick User Interface as one of 50 Beta testers with advanced access to a Mark 2 prototype version of the GameStick + GameStick bundle at launch + your name in the 'Designed By' Credits within the UI. (Simple confidentiality agreement required).

FOUNDING CONTENT PARTNER: Calling all Developers! Get your hands on a Mark 2 prototype of the GameStick with access to the SDK + GameStick bundle at launch. (Simple confidentiality agreement required).
GDC DINNER: Meet the team behind GameStick during the Games Developer Conference in March for dinner at Zuni Cafe, San Francisco + GameStick Bundle at launch.
GOLD GAMESTICK BUNDLE: For the gamer that has everythingâ€¦ one of 50 individualy numbered  gold GameStick bundles + Name Check + Gold Founder Tag next to your username.
DINNER WITH JASPER SMITH - creator of GameStick at a restaurant of your choice in Europe, Asia or the USA + a Gold Stick bundle.
